alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 01 at 11:42PM MST until December 02 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 75 mph, strongest near the base of the foothills. * WHERE...Boulder and the western suburbs of Denver. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County
